abstract: Russian Football Union appoints Alexei Tolkachev as its first dedicated antiracism official; move is attempt to reduce notorious discrimination before Russia hosts 2018 World Cup; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Russian Football Union appointed an antiracism official in an effort to crack down on discrimination before the World Cup, to be held in Russia in 2018.
snippet: The Russian Football Union appointed an antiracism official in an effort to crack down on discrimination before the World Cup, to be held in Russia in 2018.
